alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 2:46PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact southwest portions of the Inland Empire in Riverside County through 330 PM PDT... At 245 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Menifee, or 8 miles east of Lake Elsinore, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Temecula, Lake Elsinore, Hemet, Murrieta, Perris, Menifee, Sun City, Ortega Highway, Wildomar, Romoland, Lakeland Village, Quail Valley, Homeland and Winchester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
